top_categories.workout_context: Sea Otter Europe Gravel rewards athletes who can hold sustained power without blowing up — threshold is the engine that drives everything above Zone 2.
Racing Sea Otter Europe Gravel isn’t just fitness — it’s pacing, fueling, and executing when conditions deteriorate. This workout practices the race itself.
Sea Otter Europe Gravel’s spanish rolling, european gravel demands rapid power changes — surge over obstacles, settle on smoother sections, repeat for hours.
Sea Otter Europe Gravel’s spanish rolling gravel and competitive field demand explosive aerobic capacity — the ability to respond to surges without blowing up.
Sea Otter Europe Gravel’s spanish rolling gravel drains energy reserves faster than the distance suggests — durability training bridges the gap.
The G-Spot zone (88–92% FTP) is where you’ll spend the hardest sustained miles of Sea Otter Europe Gravel. Make this intensity feel like home.
Over-unders train the lactate clearance you’ll need at Sea Otter Europe Gravel when surges push you above threshold and you have to recover while still riding hard.
Critical power determines how long you can sustain above-threshold efforts at Sea Otter Europe Gravel — a higher CP means more time in the red before failure.
Short, violent efforts are unavoidable at Sea Otter Europe Gravel — climbs demanding 2-minute maximal efforts, surges to close gaps, attacks on spanish rolling gravel.
The Norwegian double-threshold method builds the sustained power base for Sea Otter Europe Gravel — massive training stimulus without the recovery cost of VO2max work.
Blended sessions combine endurance with intensity spikes — exactly what Sea Otter Europe Gravel’s spanish rolling gravel delivers on race day.
Sea Otter Europe Gravel’s 5,500ft of climbing demands seated and standing versatility — the ability to change climbing style as gradient and fatigue dictate.

race_overlay.nutrition: Target 40–60g carbs/hour for Sea Otter Europe Gravel’s 75 miles. Front-load calories in the first half. One bottle per hour minimum, more in heat.
race_overlay.terrain: Mixed terrain at Sea Otter Europe Gravel requires surface adaptability. Include weekly rides on spanish rolling gravel to build confidence. Expect: spanish rolling, european gravel, regional event.

pack_summary: This 10-workout pack focuses on TT Threshold, Race Simulation, and Gravel Specific to prepare you for 75 miles of spanish rolling gravel in Girona, Spain.
